Quick Start

1. Configure

[tool.render-engine.pg]
insert_sql = { posts = "INSERT INTO authors..." }

2. Use

PGMarkdownCollectionParser.create_entry(
    content=markdown,
    collection_name="posts",
    connection=db,
    table="posts"
)

3. Done!

Pre-configured inserts execute automatically before the markdown entry
